name: Grapher metadata for dataset_355_people_experiencing_homelessness_in_the_usa__pit__by_sheltering_status__hud__2016
description:
Marco: 

I was not sure which sub category was appropriate for this dataset. Eventually I opted for the sub category "Poverty in Individual Countries".
Following Esteban's request I uploaded only aggregates data, but the raw data has also data by US state
